original_title: โชคสองชั้น
overview: The story of Kamol, a young sheriff assigned to catch the sightsee that escaped in Bangkok. During this time, Kamol met love with Walee granddaughter. But she has a young man who is Wing, which is true, he is the villain who is looking for Wing therefore plans to eliminate the thrill with ingenuity. And the versatility of fighting, making him successful both in work and love.
title: Double Luck
